column5: My home is close to I-27 making it easy to get around the city. It is also close to many family friendly activities, nightlife, restaurants, and more. Whether you are visiting for business or leisure you will love my home! With its good location, quiet neighborhood, friendly people, and ambiance my place is a great stay when visiting the area. My home is great for families, friends, couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
